lru-type.name: MountVertex
lru-type.description: The purpose of this document is to define the interface between the mount component running in an ABM and the ACU. The ICD provides the interface definitions for all monitor and control points accepted by the ACU as part of the low level functionality which is identified at present for the control of the antenna.

assembly-type.name: MountVertex
assembly-type.description: The purpose of this document is to define the interface between the mount component running in an ABM and the ACU. The ICD provides the interface definitions for all monitor and control points accepted by the ACU as part of the low level functionality which is identified at present for the control of the antenna.

baci-property.description: Get azimuth auxiliary mode (1/2 motors enabled).

monitor-point.description: Status of azimuth encoder.

baci-property.description: Status of azimuth axis. Conditions may be fault conditions or status information. Fault conditions require the use of the CLEAR_FAULT_CMD to clear, while status information will clear when the hardware condition is cleared.

monitor-point.description: Status of azimuth axis. Conditions may be fault conditions or status information. Fault conditions require the use of the CLEAR_FAULT_CMD to clear, while status information will clear when the hardware condition is cleared.

baci-property.description: Get elevation auxiliary mode (1/2 motors enabled).

monitor-point.description: Get elevation auxiliary mode (1/2 motors enabled).

baci-property.description: Status of elevation encoders.

monitor-point.description: Status of elevation encoders.

baci-property.description: Status of elevation axis. Conditions may be fault conditions or status information. Fault conditions require the use of the CLEAR_FAULT_CMD to clear, while status information will clear when the hardware condition is cleared.

monitor-point.description: Status of elevation axis. Conditions may be fault conditions or status information. Fault conditions require the use of the CLEAR_FAULT_CMD to clear, while status information will clear when the hardware condition is cleared.
